name: Dagger (D)
description: A small knife weapon with a flat, two-edged blade approximately 200mm in length. Daggers are usually carried in a belt sheath, and less frequently are concealed in a boot sheath or strapped to the forearm. Daggers are usually the last weapon of defense, and worn constantly.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
